Author: algorthin
Text: There's a lot of things that can make a difference here. She absolutely could have been lying, or guessing and really misjudging. You could also have totally different body compositions. You could retain more water, and she could have more muscle mass. She could have massive boobs. You could have a bone structure that limits the amount that your waist and hips can shrink. You aren't horribly proportioned, nor are you fatter than you think. You have limited information on her and I can definitely understand how your eating disorder is using that information to attack you and bodies are varied. There are people with my BMI who look a hell of a lot better and a hell of a lot worse, and I had to realize that I would never have the smallest hip measurement out there because I have bones. That's how it is sometimes I guess.
